title: Sum of Two Integers
description:
Sum of Two Integers

Given two integers a and b, return the sum of the two integers without using the operators + and -.

Examples:

  • Example 1:
    Input: a = 1, b = 2
    Output: 3
  • Example 2:
    Input: a = 2, b = 3
    Output: 5

Constraints:

  • -1000 <= a, b <= 1000
solution_text: Use bit manipulation: XOR for sum without carry, AND shifted left for carry.
